title: Who did the arrangement of the Barden Bellas' final performance in the movie Pitch Perfect? - Quora

response.answer_text: Deke Sharon and  Ed Boyer A Cappella From PITCH PERFECT - Movie Production Notes...CinemaReview.com:  In the early stages of building their crew as the filmmakers searched for music arrangers, they kept coming across two names. With so many musical performances and arrangements weaved throughout Pitch Perfect, the filmmakers chose music arranger and music director ED BOYER, whose credits include FOX's Glee and NBC's a cappella competition The Sing-Off, and music director DEKE SHARON, who also worked on The Sing-Off, to join the team. "They are the godfathers of a cappella," explains Banks. "They are also in the book 'Pitch Perfect.' Ed and Deke sing on a lot of our tracks, and they're the most authentic people in the business."
